Track competitor price changes in real-time."}],["$","$La",null,{"content":"Keeping track of competitor prices on Amazon is a full-time job if done manually. With thousands of products and prices changing multiple times per day, you need automation to stay competitive. Price is one of the most important factors for Amazon shoppers. According to recent studies, 82% of Amazon customers compare prices before making a purchase decision. Web scraping allows you to automatically extract price data from Amazon product pages every hour."}],["$","div",null,{"className":"mt-12 pt-8 border-t border-slate-200","children":[["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-sm font-bold text-slate-500 uppercase tracking-wider mb-4","children":"Tags"}],["$","div",null,{"className":"flex flex-wrap gap-2","children":[["$","span","Amazon",{"className":"px-3 py-1 bg-slate-100 text-slate-600 text-sm rounded-full","children":"Amazon"}],["$","span","Price Monitoring",{"className":"px-3 py-1 bg-slate-100 text-slate-600 text-sm rounded-full","children":"Price Monitoring"}],["$","span","Web Scraping",{"className":"px-3 py-1 bg-slate-100 text-slate-600 text-sm rounded-full","children":"Web Scraping"}],["$","span","Automation",{"className":"px-3 py-1 bg-slate-100 text-slate-600 text-sm rounded-full","children":"Automation"}],["$","span","Apify",{"className":"px-3 py-1 bg-slate-100 text-slate-600 text-sm rounded-full","children":"Apify"}]]}]]}],["$","div",null,{"className":"mt-12 pt-8 border-t border-slate-200","children":["$","$Lb",null,{"href":"/blog","className":"inline-flex items-center gap-2 text-primary font-bold hover:gap-3 transition-all","children":[["$","svg",null,{"xmlns":"http://www.w3.org/2000/svg","className":"h-5 w-5","viewBox":"0 0 20 20","fill":"currentColor","children":["$","path",null,{"fillRule":"evenodd","d":"M9.707 16.707a1 1 0 01-1.414 0l-6-6a1 1 0 010-1.414l6-6a1 1 0 011.414 1.414L5.414 9H17a1 1 0 110 2H5.414l4.293 4.293a1 1 0 010 1.414z","clipRule":"evenodd"}]}],"Back to Blog"]}]}]]}]]}]]
